title: Trauma Room One
overview: Trauma Room One features extreme surgery like no other, where death is just one millimetre away. The series takes us deep inside the gripping, high-stakes world of brain and spinal surgery at The Walton Centre in Liverpool which treats more than 18,000 patients a year.The team of highly specialised surgeons work around the clock to save and transform patients' lives. From major trauma emergencies to life-altering operations, Trauma Room One puts us on the frontline of life-saving surgeries. But bewareâ€¦ it's not for the faint-hearted.
